## VertexData.getVertexBuffer() method

Gets the vertex buffer by specific vertex semantic

**Signature:**

```typescript
getVertexBuffer(semantic: VertexSemantic): StructuredBuffer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  semantic | [VertexSemantic](doc/markdown/./device.vertexsemantic.md) | The vertex semantic |

**Returns:**

[StructuredBuffer](doc/markdown/./device.structuredbuffer.md)

Vertex buffer of the given semantic
